description: Dashboard to monitor key metrics from fid-exporter

panels.description: The current amount of system CPU utilized
panels.title: CPU Used

panels.description: JVM Memory used(Note: This is not the actual machine memory)

targets.expr:
label_replace(
  fid_node_monitor_memory_used_jvm_kilobytes{clustername=~"$job", host_name=~"$node.*"} / fid_node_monitor_memory_allocated_by_javm_kilobytes{clustername=~"$job", host_name=~"$node.*"} * 100,
  "pod",
  "$1",
  "host_name",
  "(fid-[0-9]+).*"
) or 
label_replace(
  fid_node_monitor_memory_used_jvm_kilobytes{cluster_name=~"$job", host_name=~"$node.*"} / fid_node_monitor_memory_allocated_by_javm_kilobytes{cluster_name=~"$job", host_name=~"$node.*"} * 100,
  "pod",
  "$1",
  "host_name",
  "(fid-[0-9]+).*"
)

panels.title: Memory Used

panels.description: The value is 1 if the ZooKeeper service on the node can be written to. This value is 0 if the ZooKeeper service on the node cannot be written to.
panels.title: Is Scheduler on Leader

panels.description: The number of RadiantOne Universal Directory stores on the node.
panels.title: Number of HDAP Stores

panels.description: The combined index size (in GB) of all RadiantOne Universal Directory (HDAP) stores in the cluster.
panels.title: Total HDAP Size

panels.description: Time elapsed since the server is started
panels.title: Up Time

panels.description: The total number of operations RadiantOne FID has done on the connection
panels.title: Operation Count

panels.description: The live number of concurrent connections to RadiantOne FID (will never be more than connectionMax). This number increases or decreases depending on new connections coming into RadiantOne FID or existing connections being closed
panels.title: Live Connections

panels.description: Peak values for CPU, Connections, Memory, and Disk Usage
panels.title: Peak Stats

panels.description: The value is 1 if the ZooKeeper service on the node can be written to. This value is 0 if the ZooKeeper service on the node cannot be written to.
panels.title: Is ZK Writeable

panels.description: The value is 1 if the ZooKeeper service on the node can be written to. This value is 0 if the ZooKeeper service on the node cannot be written to.
panels.title: Is ZK Readable

panels.description: The value is 1 if the ZooKeeper service on the node can be written to. This value is 0 if the ZooKeeper service on the node cannot be written to.
panels.title: Is ZK ReadOnly

title: IDDM Dashboard
